remarks: The inverse relation is symmetric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
invfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
invfval.n $e |- N = ( Inv ` C ) $.
invfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
invfval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
invfval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
invsym $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> G ( Y N X ) F ) ) $.
